short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle Bionic Reading mode on web pages for improved reading experience. Make reading easier and faster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower your reading with ZenRead, the extension designed to assist those with ADHD and reading difficulties. By highlighting crucial parts of text, ZenRead creates a path for your eyes to follow, making reading a breeze.
